articles.title: Astronomers have detected a new planet four light-years away from the Sun - Carlow Live
articles.description: Astronomers have detected a new planet around the star closest to the Sun. Using the European Southern Observatory’s Very Large Telescope (ESO’s VLT) in Chile, they found evidence of the body orbiting Proxima Centauri. The candidate planet is the third detect…
articles.content:
Astronomers have detected a new planet around the star closest to the Sun.
Using the European Southern Observatorys Very Large Telescope (ESOs VLT) in Chile, they found evidence of the body orbiting… [+2080 chars]

articles.title: International trade bans imposed on N.L. and N.S. poultry after avian flu kills thousands of birds - CBC.ca
articles.description: The European Union and nine countries, including the U.S., have put trade restrictions on some poultry products from two Atlantic Canadian provinces after a strain of avian flu that's deadly for birds was identified at a Nova Scotia turkey farm.
articles.content: The European Union and nine countries, including the U.S., have put trade restrictions on some poultry products from two Atlantic Canadian provinces after a deadly strain of avian flu was identified … [+4860 chars]
